import React, { useState } from 'react' import ItemTags from './ItemTags' function ShowStats(props) { const { item, setTagList, tagList } = props const tagInput = React.createRef() const [tags, setTags] = useState([]) const [tagValue, setTagValue] = useState('') const onTagInputAreaChange = (e) => { setTagValue(e.target.value) } const addtag = () => { setTags([...tags, tagValue]) tagInput.current.value = '' setTagList([...tagList, tagValue]) } return ( <>

Powers

Intelligence: {item.powerstats.intelligence}
strength: {item.powerstats.strength}
speed: {item.powerstats.speed}
durability: {item.powerstats.durability}
power: {item.powerstats.power}
combat: {item.powerstats.combat}

Tags

onTagInputAreaChange(e)} ref={tagInput} />
{tags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}
) } export default ShowStats
